meanings.definition: Toward the front or ahead in space
meanings.sent1: She walked forward to the door.
meanings.sent2: The car moved forward slowly in traffic.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel hopped forward to grab the nut.
meanings.sent4: Time moves forward like a river flowing.
meanings.sent5: The sun rose forward, painting the sky with colors.

meanings.sent1: The clock ticks forward with each passing second.
meanings.sent2: We look forward to the weekend.
meanings.sent3: The days marched forward, one after the other.
meanings.sent4: Time moves forward, never looking back.
meanings.sent5: The future stretches forward, full of possibilities.

meanings.definition: In the direction that one is facing
meanings.sent1: He pointed forward to show the way.
meanings.sent2: The arrow flew forward towards the target.
meanings.sent3: The cat pounced forward to catch the toy.
meanings.sent4: Her gaze was fixed forward, focused on the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The path ahead stretched forward, inviting exploration.

meanings.definition: Ready, eager, or willing to do something
meanings.sent1: She is always forward in volunteering to help.
meanings.sent2: He has a forward attitude towards challenges.
meanings.sent3: The team was forward in taking on the new project.
meanings.sent4: Their forward spirit inspired others to join.
meanings.sent5: The forward mindset propelled them towards success.
